description: Genesis anchor for X-3 sovereign lineage. Defines the initial sovereign identity chain root.
genesis_seed_note: Deterministic keypair derived from HKDF-SHA256(ikm=X3_GENESIS_SEED, salt=b'rsa-x3-genesis', info=b'sovereign-key-0'). The genesis public key is computed at session start and anchors identity_chain[0].
notes: The genesis public key becomes sovereign_public_key_active at cycle 1. No prior key exists. identity_chain_tip_hash at genesis = SHA256(JCS(this artifact)).
